name: Socket App
desc: Client Server using Socket programming in C!

name: Grocery Store
desc: A store where we are able to buy vegetables and generate a bill. A website built using the React Js for frontend and Django for backend.

name: Vroom Rental Car System
desc: Using reactjs, nodejs and on collboration of 6 people, successfully made a full functional car rental system where users are able to book cars for a specific dates.

name: Weather App
desc: Using HTML, CSS, JS and PHP I have created a weather App where we get the weather details of a location, we want and also get the past 7days weather data of desired location

name: Noughts And Crosses
desc: Using the Python, I have created a noughts and crosses game where a user is able to compete with computer and also save his/her score.

name: Ceaser Cipher
desc: Using the Python, I have created a system where a user is able to decode and encode a code according to the shift he/her wants.
